summary: Provides a collection of lightweight test helpers that exercise a wide range of PyTorch tensor and module operations, serving as stubs for type checking and basic validation of the PyTorch API.
business_intent: Enable static analysis and early detection of type or signature mismatches in code that uses PyTorch by supplying stub test functions covering common tensor manipulations, neuralâ€‘network layers, loss functions, optimizers, and other library features.
